## text variable

Create a text node.

Special markers called `tags` can be put in the text. Tags provide a way to declaratively describe a position within some text, and then access the position in the resulting node.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
text: (value: string, schema: import("prosemirror-model").Schema<string, string>) => TaggedContentItem
```
